data.title: Cosmetic Dentistry Santa Monica - Porcelain Veneers Beverly Hills - Sedation Dentistry Los Angeles - Los Angeles Dentist - Century City Dentist
data.meta_description: Award-winning Los Angeles dentist Dr. Bill Dorfman, DDS is the premier cosmetic dentist for Hollywood's biggest stars. Contact him today!
data.text:
Trusted by thousands of patients for over 40 years

Dr. Bill Dorfman’s passion for dentistry has grown into one of the most prestigious cosmetic dental practices in the world.

Known to millions as Michael Jordan of Cosmetic Dentistry Dr. Bill Dorfman is a NY Times Best-Selling author and one of the only Los Angeles-based Fellows in the American Academy of Cosmetic Dentistry.

He and his team take pride in providing gold-plated service in a comfortable, compassionate environment to patients from all over the world.

NY Times Best Selling Author

Fellow in the American Academy of Cosmetic Dentistry

Humanitarian & philanthropist

2 Guinness World Records

21 lifetime achievement awards

Inventor of both Zoom & Pooof!® Tooth Whitening

Founder of non-profit LEAP Foundation

ChatGPT ranked Dr. Bill Dorfman as the #1 most well-known and respected dentist in the USA.

FEATURED ON:

Patient Testimonials

Look at the inspiring stories of those who regained their ability to smile with confidence and embarked on life’s journey with ease and comfort thanks to Dr. Bill Dorfman.

Before & After

Dental Procedures: Upper Porcelain Veneers & Crown Lengthening.

Dental Procedures: Upper Porcelain Veneers & Tooth Whitening as featured on ABC’s Extreme Makeover.

Dental Procedures: Upper & Lower Implant Bridges as featured on the CBS TV Show The Doctors.

Ready to transform your smile with Dr. Dorfman?

Our Services

From cosmetic dentistry to restorative treatments, preventive care, and dental implants, our experienced team is dedicated to helping you achieve a healthy, beautiful smile that lasts a lifetime.

No one forgets an incredible smile. Do you feel like you have the best smile possible? Do you feel confident and attractive when…

Our general dentistry services are designed to help you maintain your natural teeth, gums, and jawbone for as long as possible….

Dr. Dorfman and his team are passionate about giving you a dental experience that you enjoy. Dental sedation can comfort you…

Dental Implants

Dental implants allow patients to regain fully functional and natural appearing smiles. Tooth loss is caused by…

Porcelain Veneers

Porcelain veneers are known to be the most durable, life-like, and esthetic cosmetic dental solutions for a plefora of dental…

Teeth Whitening

Teeth whitening has become an essential part of personal maintenance. When you have a set of stunning pearly whites…

Patient Testimonials: Your Smile in Good Hands

Here are the voices of our patients and their stories. Experience first-hand the sense of community and care in Dr. Dorfman’s practice.

Dr. Dorfman inspires me! Great people, amazing offices, and the latest technological gadgetry, add to that Dr. Dorfman’s experience and reputation, is what I call the premier care, of dental care.

Malek N.

Los Angeles, CA

The dentists and staff are excellent, knowledgeable, efficient, up­to­date with the latest technology and caring. And I feel little to no pain with any treatments.

Michael P.

Los Angeles, CA

You don’t have to be famous to be seen here but they will make you feel famous (and you never know who you will see in the waiting room). I drive 4 1/2 hrs to see Dr Dorfman, he is the BEST, GENTLEST and CARING DENTIST you will ever find.

Janet C.

Los Angeles, CA

From Sennette to Dr. Loosvelt and Felicia…you could not be nicer or warmer or more welcoming in addition to being a great dental office! It is a pleasure to be there! Thank you all! ­

Carole J.

Los Angeles, CA

Unveiling Your Perfect Smile: FAQs

Everything You Need to Know About Your Journey to a Beautiful Smile

What services does Dr. Dorfman's practice offer?

Dr. Dorfman and his team are a full-service dental office. We do everything from check-ups and cleanings to a wide range of cosmetic dentistry services, including teeth whitening, veneers, dental implants, bonding, and more. Our goal is to help you achieve the perfect smile you’ve always wanted.

Does Dr. Dorfman's practice accept insurance?

While our office is primarily a fee-for-service practice, we are happy to bill your insurance and have them reimburse you directly. Please contact our office for more details.

Is cosmetic dentistry right for me?

Cosmetic dentistry is not just about appearance; it’s also about improving your oral health and functionality. We recommend scheduling a consultation with Dr. Dorfman to discuss your specific needs and goals.

How long does a typical cosmetic dentistry procedure take?

The duration of the procedure varies depending on the treatment. Simple procedures may only take an hour, while more comprehensive treatments may require multiple visits. We will provide an estimated timeframe during your consultation.

Still have questions?

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Please call our friendly team or complete the contact form below.
